hero.name: Ronny Freites
hero.title: Full-Stack Product Engineer | AI-Powered Product Builder | Content Creator

about.title: About
about.description: Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience specializing in enterprise full-stack development, serverless architecture, e-commerce platform engineering, and AI-powered solutions. Proven track record of architecting and maintaining mission-critical systems processing millions of events daily, with expertise in GraphQL optimization, third-party integrations, scalable system design, and artificial intelligence integration.
